title: Rainy city street driving at moderate speed.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a rainy city street, passing by a tall building and a parked truck.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNoon). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.1 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is wet from the rain, and there are several other cars driving in the same direction. The traffic lights are visible in the distance, and the pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk. The weather is rainy, and the visibility is moderate.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a moderate speed to ensure safety on the wet road. It is keeping a safe distance from the other cars and is prepared to slow down or stop if necessary. The driver is paying attention to the traffic lights and the pedestrians, making sure to follow the traffic rules and prioritize safety.
